Views¶

Browser¶

browser.views.index(request) Front page of the GP website.
browser.views.list_texts(request) Lists all Text in the database. User can click to view text and
browser.views.display_text(request, text_id) Displays a Text, along with associated network data.
browser.views.display_network(request[, ...]) Displays a D3-based network visualization.
browser.views.data(request) Describes how users can access and use Genecology Project data for their own
browser.views.participate(request) Describes how users can contribute to the Genecology Project.
browser.views.geographic(request) OLD: Renders a geocoded network.

Concepts¶

concepts.views.retrieve(request, uri) Get or retrieve JSON data about a Concept by uri.

Details¶

browser.views Provides a dynamic HTML inferface for end users.
concepts.views Provides JSON data about Concept instances.
networks.views Provides JSON data about various elements in networks.models.

Browser¶

Provides a dynamic HTML inferface for end users.

index(request) Front page of the GP website.
list_texts(request) Lists all Text in the database. User can click to view text and
display_text(request, text_id) Displays a Text, along with associated network data.
display_network(request[, network_id]) Displays a D3-based network visualization.
data(request) Describes how users can access and use Genecology Project data for their own
participate(request) Describes how users can contribute to the Genecology Project.
geographic(request) OLD: Renders a geocoded network.
browser.views.data(request)[source]¶

Describes how users can access and use Genecology Project data for their own research.

browser.views.display_network(request, network_id=1)[source]¶

Displays a D3-based network visualization.

User can select shapes representing Node and Edge to get more information about their attributes and textual evidence.

Parameters :

network_id : int

(default: 1) Identifier for a Network.
browser.views.display_text(request, text_id)[source]¶

Displays a Text, along with associated network data.

Appellations are highlighted in-text, and the user can navigate network data by clicking nodes or highlighted appellations.

Parameters :

text_id : int

Identifier for a Text.
browser.views.geographic(request)[source]¶

OLD: Renders a geocoded network.

browser.views.index(request)[source]¶

Front page of the GP website.

browser.views.list_texts(request)[source]¶

Lists all Text in the database. User can click to view text and associated network data.

browser.views.participate(request)[source]¶

Describes how users can contribute to the Genecology Project.

Concepts¶

Provides JSON data about Concept instances.

retrieve(request, uri) Get or retrieve JSON data about a Concept by uri.
concepts.views.retrieve(request, uri)[source]¶

Get or retrieve JSON data about a Concept by uri.

If no Concept for that uri exits, reaches out to a known ConceptAuthority and attempts to retrieve it.

Parameters :

uri : str

A URI, presumably belonging to some ConceptAuthority.

Networks¶

Provides JSON data about various elements in networks.models.

json_response(response_data) Yields JSON data from a dictionary.
node_data(nodes) Yields a nested dictionary describing a list of Node.
edge_data(edges) Yields a list of dictionaries describing a list of Node.
relation_data(relations) Yields a nested dictionary describing a list of Relation.
layout_endpoint(request, layout_id) Provides JSON describing Node and Edge positions.
layout_data(layout) Yields a dictionary of Node positions.
dataset_endpoint(request, dataset_id) Provides JSON describing Appellation and Relation for a
network_data(network_id) Generates data about Node and Edge for a given
network_endpoint(request, network_id) Provides JSON describing Nodes and Edges for a specified Network.
download_network(request, network_id[, ...]) Provides an XML representation of a network for download.
network_projection(request, network_id, ...) Provides JSON data about a Network that has been recast using a
list_datasets(request) Provides a list of all Dataset in JSON.
list_networks(request) Provides a list of all Network in JSON.
text_appellations(request[, text_id]) Provides a list of all Appellation, optionally filtered by
text_network(request[, text_id, network_id]) Provides JSON data about Node and Edge rooted in a
node_appellations(request, node_id) Provides JSON data about all Appellation for a given
edge_relations(request, edge_id) Provides JSON data about all Relation for a given
networks.views.appellation_data(appellations)[source]¶

Yields a nested dictionary describing a list of Appellation.

Parameters :

appellations : list

A list of Appellation.
Returns :

app_dict : dict

A nested dictionary describing a list of Appellation.
networks.views.dataset_endpoint(request, dataset_id)[source]¶

Provides JSON describing Appellation and Relation for a specified dataset.

Parameters :

dataset_id : int

An identifier for a Dataset.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.
networks.views.download_network(request, network_id, format='graphml', projection=None)[source]¶

Provides an XML representation of a network for download.

Parameters :

network_id : int

An identifier for Network.

format : str

(default: “graphml”) The output format for the network.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/xml.
networks.views.edge_data(edges)[source]¶

Yields a list of dictionaries describing a list of Node.

Parameters :

edges : list

A list of Edge.
Returns :

edge_data : list

A list of dictionaries describing a list of Edge.
networks.views.edge_relations(request, edge_id)[source]¶

Provides JSON data about all Relation for a given Edge.

Parameters :

edge_id : int

An identifier for Edge.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.

Yields JSON data from a dictionary.

Parameters :

response_data : dict

A dictionary containing some data.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.
networks.views.layout_data(layout)[source]¶

Yields a dictionary of Node positions.

Parameters :

layout : :

A NetworkLayout instance.
Returns :

postitions: dict :

A nested dictionary of x and y coordinates, indexed on Node id.

networks.views.network_data(network_id)[source]¶

Generates data about Node and Edge for a given Network.

Used primarily by network_endpoint().

Parameters :

network_id : int

Identifier for a Network.
Returns :

response_data : dict

A nested dictionary describing Node and Edge.
networks.views.network_endpoint(request, network_id)[source]¶

Provides JSON describing Nodes and Edges for a specified Network.

Parameters :

network_id : int

Identifier for a Network.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.
networks.views.network_projection(request, network_id, projection_id)[source]¶

Provides JSON data about a Network that has been recast using a NetworkProjection.

An identifier for a Network.

An identifier for a NetworkProjection.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.

networks.views.text_appellations(request, text_id=None)[source]¶

Provides a list of all Appellation, optionally filtered by Text.

Parameters :

text_id : int

(optional) An identifier for a Text.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.
networks.views.text_network(request, text_id=None, network_id=None)[source]¶

Provides JSON data about Node and Edge rooted in a Text.

Parameters :

text_id : int

(optional) An identifier for a Text.

network_id : int

(optional) An identifier for a Network.
Returns :

HttpResponse :

A Django HttpResponse object containing application/json.
